artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with green paper covers unbound with two hand-colored engravings of people in fashionable period dress and one hand-colored engraving of an elaborate hat (P.15,210, P.15,211, P.15,212)
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Vingt-quatrième Cahier, 10 Juillet 1787
